conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions clearly visible with clean cutaway geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection and wall thickness representation. Minor clipping at the front entrance wall.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout reproduction. Bed-1 and Bed-2 labels are swapped relative to the source, and some room dimensions on text labels are slightly distorted.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are very accurate to the original plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with good lighting. Points deducted for the presence of numerous text labels inside the 3D space which clutters the presentation.

detected_errors.description: Retained text labels and dimension strings inside the 3D render.
Room identifier labels (Bed-1/Bed-2) are swapped compared to source.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that effectively translates nearly every detail of the 2D floor plan into a volumetric model.
